column1: 2 ^ ¿~Nonne Deo subjècta èrit ánima mea~? Ab ipso enim salutáre meum. ^ Shall not my soul be subject to God~? For from him is my salvation.
3 ^ Nam et ipse Deus meus et salutáris meus~; suscèptor meus
column2: non movébor ámplius. ^ For he is my God and my saviour~; he is my protector
column3: I shall be moved no more.

column1: 4 ^ ¿~Quousque irrúitis in hòminem~? Interfìcitis univèrsi vos
column2: tamqŭam paríeti inclináto et macèriaĕ depùlsaĕ. ^ How long do you rush in upon a man~? You all kill
column3: as if you were thrusting down a leaning wall and a tottering fence.

column1: 5 ^ Verùmtamen prètium meum cogitavérunt repèllere~; cucùrri in sìti~; ore suo benedicébant
column2: et corde suo maledicébant. ^ But they have thought to cast away my price~; I ran in thirst~; they blessed with their mouth

column3: qŭóniam ab ipso patièntia mea~; ^ But truly be thou subject to God
column5: for from him is my patience.

column1: 7 ^ qŭia ipse Deus meus et salvátor meus
column2: adjútor meus~; non emigrábo. ^ For he is my God and my saviour
column3: my helper~; I shall not be moved.

column1: 8 ^ In Deo salutáre meum et glória mea~; Deus aŭxìlii mei
column2: et spes mea in Deo est. ^ In God is my salvation and my glory~; he is the God of my help
column3: and my hope is in God.

column2: omnis congregátio pòpuli~; effùndite coram illo corda vèstra~; Deus adjútor noster in aĕtèrnum. ^ Trust in him
column3: all ye congregation of people~; pour out your hearts before him~; God is our helper for ever.
ut decìpiant ipsi de vanitáte in idìpsum. ^ But vain are the sons of men
column4: the sons of men are liars in the balances
column5: that by vanity they may together deceive.

column2: et rapínas nolíte concupíscere~; divìtiaĕ si áffluant
column3: nolíte cor appónere. ^ Trust not in iniquity
column4: and covet not robberies~; if riches abound
column5: set not your heart upon them.
these two things have I heard

column3: misericórdia~; qŭia tu reddes unicuíque juxta ópera sua. ^ And to thee
column5: mercy~; for thou wilt render to every man according to his works.
